name: What's My WatchWord?
description:
Everybody's got secrets. We keep them, hide them, lock them with even more secrets. And we desperately want to know everyone else's. Reveal your opponent's WatchWord while protecting your own in this strategic twist on classic Hangman. It's a moral imperative - after all, what else might he be hiding?


FEATURES

- Earn "Runes" and buy letters to build words, shields to guard your WatchWord, or poison to attack your opponent

- Exchange extra letters for ones you need

- Make plays and check your score from your Apple Watch (optional)

- Four difficulty settings - play on Easy for a quicker game, or Pro if you really know your vocabulary

- Internet connection and Game Center account required
